security: Sharing this document could compromise sources (Casual Source A-14) and reveal internal processes for tracking individuals. Citing: 'On 2 December 1966, the records of Casual Source A-14, Oakland, California, were checked concerning SUBJECT and revealed the following information.'
summary: A local agency check report from December 1966 indicates that David Reed Fromer, possibly the subject, appeared on two mailing lists of SLATE in November 1966.
summary_one_paragraph: This document is a local agency check report dated December 2, 1966, submitted by Special Agent Marvin P. Schmidt of the 115th MI Gp (I), regarding David Reed Fromer. The report details a check of records from Casual Source A-14 in Oakland, California, revealing that an individual named David Fromer, who may or may not be the subject of the report, was found on two mailing lists of SLATE dated November 1966.
title: Local Agency Check on David Reed Fromer
